hero.title: Demos
hero.description: Discover how to create and manage your catalogue raisonné with CRstudio. Watch our videos and learn about the possibilities.

videos.title: Introduction to CRstudio
videos.description: Learn how CRstudio works and how it can help you create a professional catalogue raisonné.

videos.title: Adding artworks
videos.description: Discover how to easily add artworks to your collection.

videos.title: Customizing layouts
videos.description: See how to fully customize the layout of your catalogue raisonné.
